components: SERVICE BRAKES, HYDRAULIC,ENGINE AND ENGINE COOLING
summary: TL*THE CONTACT OWNS A 2005 MAZDA RX8.  THE  ABS AND TRACTION CONTROL LIGHT  ILLUMINATED ON 3 OCCASIONS.  THE CHECK ENGINE LIGHT  ALSO ILLUMINATED.  THE DEALER REPAIRED THE CHECK ENGINE LIGHT 6 TIMES.  THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 600.  THE CURRENT MILEAGE WAS 6,000.      *AK
